HELP_MSG_CONQUEST:
<font color='#00ff00'>[continents and kingdoms]</font>
 We can conquer the kingdoms of other continents that have succumbed to monsters and make them ours. There are several kingdoms on a continent, and a kingdom has 10 fortresses and 1 capital.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Fortress]</font>
 When you conquer a fortress, rewards are accumulated at regular intervals. There are fortresses where Gold is produced and fortresses where Soul stones are produced. You can use iron to level up your fortress. As the fortress level rises, the production increases. As the level of the fortress increases, the maximum accumulation amount (MAX) increases.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Capital]</font>
 Once you have captured all 10 fortresses in the kingdom, you can try to conquer the capital. When you conquer the capital, Ascension stones and Gold are accumulated at regular intervals. In the capital, you can appoint a hero as the Lord. A bonus multiplier is applied to the capital's rewards based on the hero's Grade. You can move directly to the location of each kingdom by touching the button at the bottom of the Conquest map.

HELP_MSG_ALTER:
<font color='#00ff00'>[Hero Summon]</font>
You can use Hero Seals to summon Heroes. You can select 1 of 4 Scrolls to summon and better Scroll will have higher probability of summoning a High Class Hero and you'll get more Hero Shards. There's a chance of summoning a full Hero.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Purchase Hero]</font>
You can use Ancient Coins to purchase Hero Shards. You can obtain Ancient Coins by Dismantling Hero Shards.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Summon Gear]</font>
You can use Gear Seals to summon Gear. You can select 1 of 4 Chests to summon and better chests will have a higher probability of summoning High Tier Gear and you'll get more Gear. There's a chance of summoning a full Hero. Depending on the progress on the Battlefield, the Chest's Level will increase. This will increase the amount of obtainable Gear Seals and also increase the Tier of Gear.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Dismantle Hero]</font>
You can dismantle Hero Shards to obtain Ancient Coins.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Hero Summon Rate]</font>
Normal Summon
B 10% (Shard 10%)
C 90% (Shard 85%, Hero 5%)
Advanced Summon
A 5% (Shard 5%)
B 16.5% (Shard 15%, Hero 1.5%)
C 78.5% (Shard 74%, Hero 4.5%)
Greater Summon
S 2.5% (Shard 2.5%)
A 16% (Shard 15%, Hero 1%)
B 23% (Shard 20%, Hero 3%)

HELP_MSG_FIELD:
<font color='#00ff00'>[Auto-Battle]</font>
Continue gathering various rewards even after turning off the game. You must tap the Claim Button to obtain EXP, Gold, and Soulstones. You can obtain other items by tapping on the Treasure Chest.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Start Battle]</font>
Starts the new Stage. You go to the next Stage upon victory. You'll always obtain Kingdom EXP, Gold, and Soulstones. You'll also be able to select a Hero's Seal or Gear Seal.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Repeat-Battle]</font>
You can battle again in a cleared Stage. You'll be able to obtain Gold, Soulstones, and items available from Auto-Battle.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Hero Skill]</font>
Heroes can use their skills during a battle. You can activate the Support Hero's Skill by tapping on the button and Warrior Heroes' Skill will trigger automatically periodically.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Auto-Progress]</font>
After entering a Battle, you can automatically progress through the Stage. You'll go to the next Stage upon winning the Normal Battle and repeatedly battle during the Repeat-Battle.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Ruins Information]</font>
You can protect the Sacred Artifact for a certain period of time to obtain various rewards. If you successfully defend the Ruins 3, 6, 9, 12, and 15 times, you'll receive additional Rubies. Protect Ruins will reset daily and the strength of monsters is of also determined at that time.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Castle HP]</font>
Castle's HP will be saved after each Ruins Battle. You cannot continue to the next battle if your HP reaches 0. You can recover the Castle's HP by tapping on the + button. Free once a day.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Purchase Buff]</font>
You can purchase Buffs which will strengthen allies during the Ruins Battle or Debuffs which will weaken enemies. You'll receive 1 of 3 Buffs every purchase at random. The Buff only lasts for 1 battle.

HELP_MSG_HERO:
<font color='#00ff00'>[Hero Type]</font>
Support Heroes are in charge of Ranged Attacks, Buffs or Summoning on top of the Castle Wall, and Warrior Heroes will fight in the Field against the Monsters. Support Type Heroes can only be placed on the Castle Slots and Warrior Type Heroes can only be placed on the Field Slots.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Level Up]</font>
Leveling up will increase a Hero's HP, ATK, and DEF. You'll need Gold and Soulstones for leveling up.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Ascend]</font>
Ascending will activate a new Skill or increase a Skill's level and increase the Hero's Stats greatly. You'll need Hero Shards and Ascension Stones for Upgrading.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Hero Gear]</font>
You can equip Gear on Heroes. Hero Gear has different properties depending on its type.

Weapon – ATK, ACCURACY, CRIT DMG Reduce
Helmet – HP, CRIT Resist, Def Penetration
Armor – CRIT, CRIT DMG, DEF
Boots – DODGE, Move Speed, Attack Speed

<font color='#00ff00'>[Set Gear Effect]</font>
If you equip 2 of the same Tier, an Gear Set Effect will be activated.

2 Equipped – CRIT DMG increases by %
3 Equipped – DEF Penetration increases by %
4 Equipped – ATK increases by %

<font color='#00ff00'>[Hero Skill]</font>
 Active Skill(Supporter) - You can cast it by touching skill button in battle.
 Active Skill(Warrior) - It is automatically cast when the activation condition is satisfied at regular intervals.
 Passive Skill - The effect of the skill is continuously maintained.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Features by skill type]</font>
 Recovery Skill - Not affected by each Hero Gear effect and Gear Set effect.
 Summoning Skills - Gear effects are applied according to the acquired passive skills. It is not affected by Gear set effects.
 Recovery Skill, Summoning Skills - Unaffected by buffs granted during battle.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Rune]</font>
 A Rune tree will be revealed as the Hero's Grade. To enhance each rune, you must Enhance the previous connected rune. Runes can be Enhancing and refine. When a rune is enhanced, the min~max value of the power of the rune increases. You also can refine a rune to determine the value within the range of min-max. Rune Pieces and Magic Dust needed to enhance and refine runes can be obtained from the Sanctuary.

HELP_MSG_SANCTUARY:
<font color='#00ff00'>[Rune Summon]</font>
 You can use Rune seals to perform Rune Summon. When summoned, you get a rune piece that can enhance the runes of each hero. Summon Exp are accumulated for each Rune Summon.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Rune Summon Step]</font>
 A new Rune Summon Step is opened according to the Exp accumulated through rune summoning. The higher the Rune Summon Step, the higher grade Rune Pieces you can get. Even if you accumulate enough Exp, the Summon Step will not open if you do not reach a required stage. The higher the summoning Step, the more rune seal you need to summon.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Rune Dismantle]</font>
You can obtain Magic dust by disassembling rune fragments. Magic Dust is used to enhance runes and refine runes.


<font color='#00ff00'>[Summon Pieces Probability]</font>
The lowest Grade of each Summon Step : 70%
Median Grade of each Summon Step : 22%
Top Grade of each Summon Step : 8%

HELP_MSG_CASTLE:
<font color='#00ff00'>[Level Up]</font>
Leveling up the Castle will increase the Castle‘s HP and Archer‘s ATK.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Increase Slots]</font>
When you reach a certain level, a Slot to place a Hero will be added.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Increase Archers]</font>
When you reach a certain level, Archers on the Castle Wall will increase.

<font color='#00ff00'>[DEF engraving]</font>
The imprint of the ancients is engraved on the castle, giving the castle DEF. Engraving requires Ancient Coins. Each time you make an engraving, EXP increases, and when you gain 2000 experience, the engraving level increases. You can use rubies to make advanced engraving. Advanced engraving earns at least 200 experience, and the probability of obtaining high experience is higher than normal engraving.

HELP_MSG_ARCHER:
<font color='#00ff00'>[Gear Classification]</font>

Weapon: Bow and arrow. You'll need Enhance Scrolls to enhance weapons, and you'll need Weapon Protection Stones to protect them.
Armor: Helmet, Armor, Gloves, Boots. You'll need Armor Enhance Scrolls to enhance armor and you'll need Armor Protection Stones to protect them.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Gear Effect]</font>

Bow – ATK / Attack Speed
Arrow – ATK / Attack Speed
Helmet – ATK / DEF Penetration
Armor – ATK / ACCURACY
Gloves – ATK / CRIT
Boots – ATK / CRIT DMG

<font color='#00ff00'>[Gear Element]</font>

Fire – Reduces the Enemy's ATK.
Frost – Slows the Enemy.
Electric – Paralyzes the Enemy.
Poison – Reduces the Enemy's DEF.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Gear Trait]</font>
Elemental Gear will gain the Element's Trait. Bow's Trait is an activation effect and other Gear's Trait enhances the Bow's same Element Trait.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Enhancing]</font>
You can use the Enhance Scroll to Enhance Gear. The main Element will increase upon success. From +4 Enhancing and on your Enhancing may fail and may decrease the Enhancing. If you use Protection Stone when enhancing the Enhancing probability will increase.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Promotion]</font>
Gear over +12 can promote the Gear's Tier. Promoted Gear's Enhancing will reset.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Craft]</font>
You can craft Gear. You'll need Designs to craft them. The Quality of the Gear will be chosen upon crafting. Better quality will give the Gear higher Stats. Upon a Great Success you'll obtain an Elemental Gear.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Purchase]</font>
You can use Steel to purchase Gear Designs, Enhance Scrolls, and Protection Stones. You can purchase the Gear's Designs if you've crafted it once before.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Dismantle]</font>
You can Dismantle Archer's item and obtain Steel. You can Dismantle Gear, Designs, Enhance Scroll, and Protection Stone.

HELP_MSG_RAID:
<font color='#00ff00'>[Boss Information]</font>
You can eliminate the Boss found outside the Kingdom and obtain items for growth. There are 2 Bosses currently, and the Bosses will change daily.

Dragon of the Abyss – Periodically performs a strong Breath.
Wolf of Full Moon – Periodically slams the ground and deals damage.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Victory Reward Chest]</font>
Upon Victory, you'll receive Expedition Coins and you can also select 1 of 5 Chests to obtain a Reward. The first chest is free and from then on you'll need Rubies to open them.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Boss Reward]</font>
Different rewards are given for each Boss.

Dragon of the Abyss – Shining Weapon Enhance Scrolls, Weapon Protection Stones, and Shining Weapon Protection Stones
Wolf of Full Moon – Shining Armor Enhance Scrolls, Armor Protection Stones, Shining Armor Protection Stones
